entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
